text: This is a list of episodes from the sixth season of the CBS-TV series Alice. ==Episodes== ==Broadcast history== The season originally aired Sundays at 9:00-9:30 pm (EST).TV Listings for October 4, 1981TV Listings for May 16, 1982 ==References== Category:1981 American television seasons Category:1982 American television seasons
title: Alice (season 6)
